meanings.definition: Amplifying sound, especially through a megaphone.
meanings.sent1: The megaphonic announcement echoed across the field.
meanings.sent2: The megaphonic voice of the coach could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The megaphonic chirping of the birds startled the sleepy cat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as megaphonic as a thunderclap in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The megaphonic roar of the crowd filled the stadium with energy.
